923310.name: Phoenix Dynasty 2 - Caishen Package
923310.description:
It’s high time you made your choice, Azurians! Are you with the DarkAzure or the DawnAzure? This new package enables you to choose either the Heaven or the Demon Wings as well as the materials needed to upgrade your mounts. If you wish to exploit this privilege before anyone else, do not miss out on this great opportunity!

The package will be transferred to your Phoenix Dynasty 2 account automatically upon your purchase. All you need to is click the ‘’Reward’’ option that will appear on the right top of the screen (next to the Mini-Map).
Remember! You can purchase the Caishen Package only once for each account and use it in one character only!



Shen Long
- Available for all classes after Level 20.
- Permanent.
- Adds 200 Strength/Int, 400 M.Attack, 800 Phy.Attack, and 3000 Max HP.
Mount Upgrade Materials
- All the materials you need to upgrade your mount to level 3.
- They are all bound and can not be traded.
Heaven and Demon Wings
- Available for all classes after Level 30.
- +1300 Physique, +780 Agility and 6% bonus elemental damage.
- Bound and can not be traded.

Note: Your package will be transferred to the first server you log in PDO2 after the purchase.
923310.supported_languages: 土耳其语, 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
